attributes.title: this app killed my family
attributes.review: when i opened this app, “bunker-boy orange” flashing lights appeared 😡my terminally epileptic family all fell to the ground and promptly passed away 🤷🏽‍♀️🐒🥺 even my border collie named biscuit 🦹🏽‍♀️🥱🐕‍🦺so, this app ruined my life and left me a dogless orphan!! god i wish my mother had aborted me 🦛🧝🏼‍♀️🤶🏼💋👁👅👁

attributes.title: Terrible✨
attributes.review: This app was utter ✨garbage ✨ and I recommend sparring yourself the time and just leaving a 1 star review

i really downloaded this app to support our wonderful non racist and non homophobic ✨orange✨ but it took 3 weeks to download, and when it did i was frightened when i opened the app. there was a large orange and i was so frightened i nearly pooed myself.
